fluidlogged.config.compatibilityMode.too: Some mods may cause incompatibilities with this mod. Enabling this option will fix most issues and will only allow vanilla blocks to be fluidloggable.
fluidlogged.config.title: Fluidlogged Config
fluidlogged.config.warning: §nWARNING:§r Changes in this config may mix up fluidlogged blocks in your previous worlds. Make sure to backup your worlds before entering one!
fluidlogged.confirm_save.message: Do you want to save these changes?
fluidlogged.confirm_save.title: Unsaved Changes
fluidlogged.fluidMismatchWarning.descrip:
This worlds fluidlogged configuration doesn't match with your current mod configuration.
Loading this world may cause fluidlogged blocks to mix up. Please make a backup before entering this world!
fluidlogged.fluidMismatchWarning.title: Configuration Mismatch
fluidlogged.fluid_config.error_toast.des: At least one fluid must be enabled!
fluidlogged.fluid_config.title: Fluids
fluidlogged.restart_required.message: Your game must be restarted to apply these changes!
fluidlogged.restart_required.title: Game Restart Required
